title: Omega squad teemo uses classic teemo voice over sometimes

replies.body:
Hiya TheOvermind - 

Thanks for the report! We are aware of issues where some skins with new VO are playing base VO. We're working on a fix!
thanks for letting me know ! keep up  the good work :D
Seems to be happening on Blood Lord Vladimir too, in case you hadn't heard of that case yet!
Yup! That's a known one, too! :D Thank you!
Yeah I also played on my Infernal Nasus and when I spammed laugh I got classic Nasus laugh instead of Infernal's :(
Yeah, this is a larger issue that occurred during an audio clarity update. We're working to get all of these sorted out. :)
